Unlike overcrowded coastal towns, Los Alcazares maintains a residential character with planned developments like Serena Golf that prioritize community amenities and property values.

faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase Spanish property without residency restrictions. Non-EU and non-EEA citizens require a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and must comply with currency declaration requirements for amounts exceeding €10,000. Legal representation is standard and highly recommended. Most transactions conclude within 30-60 days. English-speaking Spanish lawyers specializing in property transactions are widely available throughout Costa Blanca.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Total acquisition costs typically total 8-10% above purchase price. Spanish property transfer tax ranges 6-8% depending on regional location. Legal fees cost €800-€1,500. Notary fees are approximately €500-€800. Property registration costs €300-€500. Additional costs may include property surveys (€200-€400) and property inspections. For this €265,000 property, expect total acquisition costs of €21,200-€26,500, bringing total investment to approximately €286,200-€291,500.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for properties in Los Alcazares?

After accounting for property management (15-20%), utilities, maintenance, and insurance (approximately €8,000-€10,000 annually), net rental income approximates €25,000-€30,000 yearly—delivering 9-11% annual returns on €265,000 acquisition cost. faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Spanish property ownership involves annual municipal property taxes (IBI) averaging 0.4-0.6% of cadastral value yearly, translating to approximately €800-€1,200 annually for this property. Non-resident property owners pay 19% income tax on rental profits above cost deductions. Residents benefit from Spanish resident taxation structures providing deductions for maintenance, management, and depreciation. Inheritance and gift taxes apply to property transfers between individuals, though EU citizens benefit from certain exemptions and reductions. Property transfer tax (6-8%) applies at purchase.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Foreign property buyers can access Spanish mortgages through Spanish banks, typically requiring 20-30% down payment and demonstrating income verification. EU/EEA citizens access mortgages most easily. Non-EU citizens face additional documentation requirements including NIE registration and currency origin verification. Spanish mortgages typically carry 20-30 year terms at current rates of 3-4%. Alternatively, UK buy-to-let mortgages can finance Spanish properties, often with more favorable rates for established investors. Professional mortgage brokers specializing in Spanish properties streamline application processes.

faqs.question: Как далеко Коста-Бланка от России?
faqs.answer: Коста-Бланка расположена примерно в 1,300 km south of London, accessible via 2-2.5 hour direct flights from major UK airports to Alicante-Elche Airport (45 km from Los Alcazares). Budget airlines including Ryanair, EasyJet, and Wizz Air operate daily UK-Alicante routes with fares typically €40-€120 return. Ferry alternatives from Portsmouth to Cherbourg exist but require 12+ hours additional driving. For property managers visiting remotely, direct flight accessibility and affordable airfares make Los Alcazares practical for periodic property inspections and maintenance oversight.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Коста-Бланка имеет средиземноморский климат with 300+ annual sunshine days, average temperatures of 18°C winter and 28°C summer, and minimal winter rainfall. Micro-climate positioning near Mar Menor creates stable temperatures year-round. Summer (June-September) reaches 28-32°C with virtually no rain. Spring (April-May) and autumn (September-October) offer pleasant 20-25°C temperatures. Winter (December-February) averages 14-18°C with occasional rainfall. This climate supports year-round holiday rental demand and outdoor activities including golf, beach recreation, and water sports—differentiating Los Alcazares from seasonally-dependent northern European markets.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Los Alcazares averages 30-40% below UK equivalents. Supermarket groceries cost €60-€80 weekly for individuals. Restaurant meals cost €8-€15 for mains. Utilities (electricity, water, gas) average €100-€150 monthly. Domestic help costs €10-€15 hourly. Golf memberships range €1,000-€3,000 annually. Healthcare costs through private clinics average 50-60% below UK private practice fees. Property management services (cleaning, maintenance, guest communication) cost 15-20% of rental income—accessible for owner-operators generating €25,000+ annual rental income. Overall, owner-occupants can maintain comfortable lifestyles at €1,200-€1,800 monthly.
